Description.Text: Ambassador hotel Dubai was the first hotel in Dubai which carries a long legacy of hospitality, excellence and goodwill and draws tourists, family`s & businessmen alike. We offer our guests the best where luxury meets lifestyle. Situated in the heart of Dubai`s shopping district, ambassador hotel is surrounded by gold, textile and electric markets, making it a favorite spot for a We offer a varied choice of room formats & all our rooms are newly renovated and equipped with wireless internet access (wi-fi) in all rooms. Our business center is fully equipped and open for 24 hours for hotel guests. In addition to excellent hotel rooms, ambassador hotel is also well equipped for; The best in dining and entertainment Conferences Recreational facilities Business and conferencing facilities Banquet facilities. Ambassador hotel is an ideal location for; Business meetings Product launches Dealer incentives meetings Business presentations Weddings & engagements All types of social gatherings
